external_games.name: King James Bible for Use on Game Boy
King James Bible For Use On Game Boy

name: King James Bible for Use on Game Boy
summary: Finally! Game Boy has found it's ultimate calling. The Bible on Game Boy is the perfect addition to my devotion time Bible studies. The complete word search and quick reference capabilities make it a must for anyone who owns a Game Boy. Keep a fresh set of Batteries around - you'll be reading this Bible a lot...
